inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: amount of token values for approving

abiDocs.name: approve
abiDocs.details: Give to target address ability for self token manipulation without sending

inputs.name: _from

abiDocs.name: transferFrom
abiDocs.notice: from `_from` will be sended `_value` tokens to `_to`

abiDocs.name: destroy
abiDocs.details: Destroy contract and scrub a data

inputs.name: _value
inputs.description: amount of token values to send

abiDocs.name: transfer
abiDocs.details: Transfer self tokens to given address

inputs.name: _owner
inputs.description: The address of the account owning tokens

inputs.name: _spender
inputs.description: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

abiDocs.name: allowance
abiDocs.return: Amount of remaining tokens allowed to spent

abiDocs.name: unapprove
abiDocs.details: Reset count of tokens approved for given address
